lead: Unlocking unprecedented potential with cutting-edge artificial intelligence solutions for your business.
about_us_content: Specialized in creating Generative and Agentic AI solutions that cater to various industries, providing tailored systems that integrate seamlessly into your existing operations. Our team of experts leverages the latest advancements in AI to deliver exceptional results that propel your business into the future.
solution1_text: Transform your business with expert AI consulting. Our team will help you identify opportunities, develop strategies, and implement AI solutions that align with your goals.
solution2_text: Design tailored AI applications to meet your specific needs. From machine learning models to natural language processing, we create custom solutions that drive results.
solution3_text: Integrate AI seamlessly into your existing systems. Our integration services ensure smooth implementation and optimal performance.
solution4_text: Unlock the power of your data with advanced analytics. Our AI-driven insights help you make informed decisions and uncover hidden trends.
product2_text: Discover the best deals and prices across your favorite e-commerce sites with our AI-powered platform. We gather and analyze data from top retailers, helping you make smarter shopping decisions effortlessly. Save time, shop smart, and get the best offers tailored to you.
product1_text: Enhance your customer service experience with our AI-powered platform. We offer intelligent and fast solutions to improve customer interactions, resolve issues quickly, and streamline your support process. Save time, increase efficiency, and deliver personalized support effortlessly.
product0_text: Transform the way you manage information with our AI-powered RAG system. We seamlessly retrieve and generate accurate insights from your organization’s knowledge base. Enhance collaboration, boost efficiency, and unlock the full potential of your team’s expertise.
get_started_text: Experience the future of AI with NexuMind. Whether you're looking to enhance your operations, make smarter decisions, or unlock new opportunities, our AI solutions are here to help.

Your message has been received.
A member of our team will contact you as soon as possible.
Thank you for your patience.

terms_intro_paragraph: Thank you for visiting NexuMind! By accessing and using our website (<link>https://nexumind.com</link>), you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully. If you do not agree with any of the terms, you should discontinue using our website and services immediately.
terms_intro_paragraph_0: Thank you for visiting NexuMind! By accessing and using our website
terms_intro_paragraph_1: you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully. If you do not agree with any of the terms, you should discontinue using our website and services immediately.
terms_1_paragraph: By accessing and using the NexuMind website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms, as well as any other terms and policies referenced herein. We may modify these Terms & Conditions at any time, and your continued use of the site signifies your acceptance of any updates.
terms_2_paragraph: You must be at least 18 years old to use this website. By using the site, you affirm that you meet this age requirement. If you are under the age of 18, you may use the site only under the supervision of a parent or guardian.
terms_3_paragraph: You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes. You are prohibited from:
terms_3_list_item_1: Engaging in any fraudulent, illegal, or harmful activity.
terms_3_list_item_2: Violating any local, state, national, or international laws in your use of the website.
terms_3_list_item_3: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the website, or systems connected to the website.
terms_3_list_item_4: Using any automated systems, such as robots or spiders, to access our site in a manner that sends more requests to the NexuMind servers than a human could reasonably produce.
terms_3_list_item_5: Uploading or transmitting any viruses, worms, or any other code of a destructive nature.
terms_3_list_item_6: Harassing, abusing, or harming another individual through the website.
terms_4_paragraph_1: You may be required to create an account to access certain features of the website. When creating your account, you agree to:
terms_4_list_item_1: Provide accurate, current, and complete information.
terms_4_list_item_2: Keep your login information confidential and not share it with others.
terms_4_list_item_3: Notify us immediately if you suspect any unauthorized use of your account.
terms_4_paragraph_2: NexuMind reserves the right to terminate your account or refuse service at any time, without notice, for any reason.
terms_5_paragraph: All content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, video clips, data compilations, and software, on NexuMind is the property of NexuMind or its content providers and is protected by international copyright laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, display, or create derivative works of any content on this site without our prior written permission.
terms_5_subsection_a_paragraph: "NexuMind" and its logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of NexuMind. Other trademarks, service marks, graphics, and logos used in connection with the site may be the trademarks of other third parties. Your use of the website does not grant you any right or license to use any NexuMind or third-party trademarks.
terms_6_paragraph_1: Any information or content that you upload, post, or submit to the website, including reviews, comments, or suggestions, becomes the property of NexuMind. By submitting any content to us, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, perpetual, irrevocable, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, and display such content.
terms_6_paragraph_2: You represent and warrant that any content you submit does not infringe on the intellectual property rights of third parties, is not defamatory, obscene, offensive, or illegal, and does not violate any laws.
terms_7_paragraph: NexuMind may include links to third-party websites for your convenience. These websites are not under the control of NexuMind, and we are not responsible for their content or practices. The inclusion of any third-party link does not imply endorsement or sponsorship of the linked site by NexuMind. You use these links at your own risk, and NexuMind is not liable for any damages related to your use of third-party websites.
terms_8_paragraph_2: to understand our practices regarding the collection and use of your information. By using our website, you agree to the terms outlined in our Privacy Policy.
terms_8_paragraph: Please review our <link>Privacy Policy</link> to understand our practices regarding the collection and use of your information. By using our website, you agree to the terms outlined in our Privacy Policy.
terms_9_paragraph_1: The website and its content are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis, without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement, or performance.
terms_9_paragraph_2: NexuMind does not warrant that the website will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free, or that any defects will be corrected. We do not warrant that the website or any information, content, or materials available on the website are free of viruses or other harmful components.
terms_10_paragraph_1: To the fullest extent permitted by law, NexuMind shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, special, or punitive damages resulting from:
terms_10_list_item_1: Your use or inability to use the website.
terms_10_list_item_2: Any errors or inaccuracies in the content provided on the site.
terms_10_list_item_3: Any unauthorized access to or use of our servers or any personal information stored therein.
terms_10_list_item_4: Any bugs, viruses, or other harmful content transmitted to or through the website by any third party.
terms_10_list_item_5: Any conduct or content of third parties using the website.
terms_10_paragraph_2: In no event shall NexuMind's total liability to you for all claims exceed the amount you paid to NexuMind, if any, for accessing the website.
terms_11_paragraph_1: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless NexuMind, its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents, from any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including attorney's fees) arising from:
terms_11_list_item_1: Your use of and access to the website.
terms_11_list_item_2: Your violation of these Terms & Conditions.
terms_11_list_item_3: Your infringement of any third party's rights, including but not limited to intellectual property rights or privacy rights.
terms_12_paragraph: We reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to terminate or suspend your access to the website, without notice, for any reason, including but not limited to a violation of these Terms & Conditions. Upon termination, your right to use the website will immediately cease, and any provision of these terms that by their nature should survive termination will continue in effect.
terms_13_paragraph: These Terms & Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. You agree to submit to the personal and exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for the resolution of any disputes arising out of or relating to your use of the website.
terms_14_paragraph: NexuMind reserves the right to modify or update these Terms & Conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we will indicate the date these terms were last revised. Your continued use of the website after any such changes signifies your acceptance of the updated terms.
terms_15_paragraph_1: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us at:
privacy_intro_paragraph_1_part1: At NexuMind, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect from you when you visit our website (
privacy_intro_paragraph_1_part2: ), how we use that information, and the steps we take to ensure it remains secure.
privacy_intro_paragraph_2: By using our website, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Please read this policy carefully. If you do not agree to our policy, please do not use our services.
privacy_1_paragraph_1: We collect the following types of information from our users:
privacy_1_subsection_a_paragraph: This is any information that can be used to personally identify you, such as:
privacy_1_subsection_a_list_item_4: Any other information you voluntarily provide through forms or contact sections.
privacy_1_subsection_b_paragraph: This is any information that cannot be used to identify you personally, such as:
privacy_1_subsection_c_paragraph_1: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your Browse activities. Cookies are small data files stored on your device that allow us to recognize your browser and remember certain information.
privacy_1_subsection_c_paragraph_2: You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings, but please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of the website.
privacy_2_paragraph_1: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services. Specifically, we may use your information for the following purposes:
privacy_2_list_item_1_rest: To process and fulfill your requests or orders and to provide you with the services you request from us.
privacy_2_list_item_2_rest: To communicate with you, including responding to inquiries, addressing issues, and providing updates related to your account or services.
privacy_2_list_item_3_rest: To personalize your experience on our website, such as showing content tailored to your preferences.
privacy_2_list_item_4_rest: To analyze website traffic and usage trends to improve our site's functionality and user experience.
privacy_2_list_item_5_rest: With your consent, to send you marketing communications, such as newsletters, promotional offers, and updates.
privacy_2_list_item_6_rest: To ensure compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and legal requests.
privacy_3_paragraph_1: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with third parties under the following circumstances:
privacy_3_subsection_a_paragraph: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or providing services to you. These service providers are contractually bound to protect your information and only use it for the purposes we specify.
privacy_3_subsection_b_paragraph: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid legal requests, such as court orders, subpoenas, or government investigations.
privacy_3_subsection_c_paragraph: In the event that NexuMind undergoes a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your personal information may be transferred as part of that transaction. We will notify you of such changes and give you an opportunity to opt-out if your data will be subject to a different privacy policy.
privacy_4_paragraph_1: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. These measures include, but are not limited to:
privacy_4_list_item_1: Encryption of sensitive data during transmission
privacy_4_list_item_2: Regular security audits and vulnerability scans
privacy_4_list_item_3: Limiting access to personal information to authorized personnel only
privacy_4_paragraph_2: Despite these efforts, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, while we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy_5_paragraph: We will retain your personal information for as long as is necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required by law. Once your information is no longer needed, we will securely delete or anonymize it.
privacy_6_paragraph_1: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
privacy_6_subsection_a_paragraph: You may request access to the personal information we hold about you, and you can request that we update, correct, or delete this information.
privacy_6_subsection_b_paragraph: In certain circumstances, you may have the right to request that we transfer your personal information to another data controller.
privacy_6_subsection_c_paragraph: If you have provided consent for the processing of your data, you may withdraw that consent at any time. However, withdrawing your consent will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on your consent before its withdrawal.
privacy_6_subsection_d_paragraph: You can opt out of receiving marketing communications from us by following the unsubscribe instructions provided in those communications or by contacting us directly.
privacy_6_subsection_e_paragraph: You can set your browser to refuse cookies or alert you when cookies are being sent. If you disable cookies, some features of our site may not function properly.
privacy_7_paragraph: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by NexuMind. This Privacy Policy does not apply to third-party websites, and we are not responsible for their privacy practices. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of those third-party sites before providing any information.
privacy_8_paragraph: NexuMind's website is not intended for use by children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete that information. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided personal information to us, please contact us.
privacy_9_paragraph: Your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have data protection laws that are different from the laws of your country. By using our website, you consent to the transfer of your information to these countries.
privacy_10_paragraph: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, technologies, legal requirements, or other factors. When we do, we will revise the “Last Updated” date at the top of this policy. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information.
privacy_11_paragraph_1: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
company_info: Company AL-AQL MITRABET For Information Technology. C. R. No. 1009120875

News.title: Transforming the E-Commerce Experience: Launch of the First Arabic AI Shopping Assistant by Rakhys
News.desc_part1: In a groundbreaking move that redefines the digital shopping landscape in Saudi Arabia,
News.desc_part2: proudly announces the launch of the first AI-powered shopping assistant available in Arabic, developed by the Saudi AI startup NexuMind. This innovative ...
News.paragraph_1_part1: In a groundbreaking move that redefines the digital shopping landscape in Saudi Arabia,
News.paragraph_1_part2: proudly announces the launch of the first AI-powered shopping assistant available in Arabic, developed by the Saudi AI startup
News.paragraph_1_part3: . This innovative tool is designed to meet the demands of modern consumers who seek the best deals and exclusive offers on electronic devices from leading local and global e-commerce platforms.
News.section_2_title: A Seamless and Comprehensive Shopping Experience
News.section_2_paragraph: The AI shopping assistant by Rakhys leverages cutting-edge data analytics to sift through vast amounts of information across various online retail sites. By consolidating prices and deals into a single, intuitive interface, it empowers users to easily compare options and make informed purchasing decisions without the hassle of manual searches. Its user-friendly design ensures accessibility for everyone—even those with limited technical expertise—while consistently delivering tailored recommendations based on individual shopping habits.
News.section_3_title: Global Trends in AI-Driven Shopping Assistants
News.section_3_paragraph_part1: The launch of Rakhys innovative tool aligns with a global shift toward AI-enhanced shopping experiences. Major industry players such as Amazon and Walmart have already set the precedent with solutions like
News.section_3_part4: further exemplifies how AI can transform the customer experience. These systems are redefining the way consumers interact with brands by providing instant, personalized support, and real-time insights, ultimately leading to higher satisfaction and reduced shopping friction.
News.section_4_paragraph: The advanced AI technology behind the Rakhys assistant is engineered to enhance every stage of the customer journey. Its key benefits include:
News.section_4_list_item_1_rest: Users receive real-time notifications of the most compelling deals and promotions on electronic devices.
News.section_4_list_item_2_rest: By instantly comparing prices across multiple platforms, the tool significantly reduces the time and effort required to find the best option.
News.section_4_list_item_3_rest: The assistant addresses customer queries immediately, fostering trust and facilitating informed decision-making.
News.section_5_title: Merging Local Expertise with Global Technological Advancements
News.section_5_paragraph: Rakhys uniquely combines an in-depth understanding of the Saudi market with the latest in global AI advancements. This blend ensures that the shopping assistant not only caters to the specific needs and habits of local consumers but also meets the high standards set by international e-commerce innovations. The result is an unparalleled shopping tool that offers both precision and speed, making it a valuable asset for every tech-savvy shopper in Saudi Arabia.
News.section_6_title: A Vision for the Future of E-Commerce
News.section_6_paragraph: The team at Rakhys is committed to continuous innovation in response to the evolving demands of digital consumers. Recognizing the fierce competition in today’s e-commerce landscape, they plan to further expand the capabilities of their AI assistant to encompass a wider array of products and services. This forward-thinking approach is set to revolutionize how consumers interact with online shopping platforms, paving the way for a more intelligent, efficient, and customer-centric future.
News.section_7_paragraph_1: The launch of the first Arabic AI shopping assistant by Rakhys marks a significant milestone in enhancing the digital shopping experience in Saudi Arabia. By harnessing advanced AI technology, this pioneering tool simplifies price comparisons and uncovers the best deals available on electronic devices, all while providing personalized support that meets the unique needs of local shoppers.
News.section_7_paragraph_2: With Rakhys, customers are invited to embrace a seamless blend of innovation and local insight—ushering in a new era of smarter, more intuitive online shopping.
